advancements.mostructures.description: A list of our best structures, just for you!
advancements.mostructures.church.title: A Forgotten War
advancements.mostructures.barnhouse.desc: Looks like they left in a hurry...
advancements.mostructures.pyramid.title: The Tomb of the Arrogant
advancements.mostructures.icetower.title: Shivering Haunts
advancements.mostructures.icetower.descr: This place seems to attract lots of strays...
Watch out for the priests on the lower level!
advancements.mostructures.tavern.title: Food & Hospitality
advancements.mostructures.tavern.descrip: Eat and rest, traveler! We got you covered.
advancements.mostructures.tcits.title: A Distant Memory in the Sky...
advancements.mostructures.tcits.descript: Nostalgia brought this structure back from the dead.
advancements.mostructures.market.title: Where The Tradesmen Go
advancements.mostructures.market.descrip: A lively place for trading & selling your goods! Also serves as a nice base.
If you find an Iron Golem, salute him. He fought in the Forgotten War...
advancements.mostructures.bazaar.title: Sandy Bartering
advancements.mostructures.bazaar.descrip: Traveling villagers who needed a trading place, in the desert!
